query:
-- Add 10 new evaluation criteria columns
ALTER TABLE idea_analysis 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS technicalNoveltyScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 15%',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS socialImpactScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 15%',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS technicalFeasibilityScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 12%',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS commercialValueScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 12%',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS technicalRiskScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 8%',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS timeToMarketScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 8%',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS competitiveAdvantageScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 5%',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS organizationalReadinessScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Weight: 5%';

-- Add Technology Readiness Level (TRL) columns
ALTER TABLE idea_analysis
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trlLevel INT COMMENT '1-9 (1: Basic principles, 9: Actual system proven)',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trlDescription TEXT;

-- Add Stage Gate columns
ALTER TABLE idea_analysis
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS currentStageGate ENUM('ideation', 'scoping', 'business_case', 'development', 'testing', 'launch'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stageGateRecommendation TEXT;

-- Add Technology Readiness Level (TRL) columns

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trlDescription TEXT;
